Layer.Name: Audio
Layer.PlayCommand:
%function(self) self:stop() self:start()
if SCREENMAN:GetTopScreen():GetName() == 'ScreenGameplay' then SCREENMAN:GetTopScreen():PauseGame(true) end
self:sleep( self:get():GetLengthSeconds() ) self:queuecommand('Stop') end
Layer.StopCommand:
%function(self) self:GetParent():hidden(1)
if SCREENMAN:GetTopScreen():GetName() == 'ScreenGameplay' then SCREENMAN:GetTopScreen():PauseGame(false) --GAMESTATE:FinishSong() end end
